targets.query: SELECT mean("NH3") FROM "autogen"."crds" WHERE ("analyzer" = 'AMADS3001' AND "valve_pos" = '1' ) AND ("valve_stable_time" > 10) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
